mapper.sql: ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SUBJECT, CONTENT, CREATED_TIME, OPEN, IS_DELETED, SYS_ITEMS, SENDER_ID, IS_ATTACHED, ITEM_UNITS, ITEM_UNITTYPES
mapper.select:
select count(*) from MESSAGE where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or RECEIVER_ID like '${searchValue}%' or SENDER_NAME like '${searchValue}%' or SENDER_ID like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into MESSAGE (ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SUBJECT, CONTENT, CREATED_TIME, OPEN, IS_DELETED, SYS_ITEMS, SENDER_ID, IS_ATTACHED, ITEM_UNITS, ITEM_UNITTYPES) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{open,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sysItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAttached,jdbcType=BIT}, #{itemUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemUnittypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

replace into MESSAGE (ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SUBJECT, CONTENT, CREATED_TIME, OPEN, IS_DELETED, SYS_ITEMS, SENDER_ID, IS_ATTACHED, ITEM_UNITS, ITEM_UNITTYPES) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.receiverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.open,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.sysItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isAttached,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.itemUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemUnittypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID

mapper.update:
update MESSAGE
RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SENDER_NAME = #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPEN = #{open,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
SYS_ITEMS = #{sysItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SENDER_ID = #{senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ATTACHED = #{isAttached,jdbcType=BIT},
ITEM_UNITS = #{itemUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_UNITTYPES = #{itemUnittypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
